description: Grants the user the ability to create a spherical territory where they can manipulate everything within it, including the positions and arrangement of objects and people. The user can also perform surgical operations without physical contact.

users.circumstances: Law ate the fruit as a child

abilityReveals.description: Law uses his powers to restore Smoker and Tashigi to their original bodies, reversing the body swap.
abilityReveals.firstUseContext: Law restores Smoker and Tashigi as part of his deal to secure their cooperation against Caesar and Vergo.

strengths.strength: Ability to manipulate objects and people within Room
strengths.description: Law demonstrates strategic use of his powers by having prepared fake chains in advance.
